Posts.HTML: Hi guys, one question, the publishing option in private is only available for the web versi贸n?  I couldn't find it on the pc versi贸n.

Posts.EditableText: You can specify private when you go to upload your PC-published game to the Quest web server. That's where "private" makes sense.
Posts.HTML: You can specify private when you go to upload your PC-published game to the Quest web server. That's where "private" makes sense.
